alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Orange (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 1:40PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Orange and southeastern Caledonia Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 139 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Newbury, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West Fairlee, Bradford, Topsham Four Corners, Wells River Village, Ryegate, Newbury, Newbury Village, Topsham, Fairlee, Corinth, Barnet, Vershire, Waterford, Wells River, West Fairlee Center, Newbury Center, South Ryegate, Boltonville, Mcindoe Falls and South Newbury. This includes Interstate 91 between mile markers 95 and 118, and between mile markers 120 and 124. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central and northeastern Vermont.
